list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move along a smooth surface while maintaining continuous contact with it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she slid down the bank into the water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô trượt xuống bờ vào nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a structure with a smooth sloping surface for children to slide down.
an act of moving along a smooth surface while maintaining continuous contact with it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: use an ice axe to halt a slide on ice and snow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sử dụng một rìu băng để dừng một slide trên băng và tuyết

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a decline in value or quality.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the current slide in house prices
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Slide hiện tại về giá nhà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a part of a machine or musical instrument that slides.
a rectangular piece of glass on which an object is mounted or placed for examination under a microscope.
a sandal or light shoe without a back.
